Back to Ludwig van Beethoven

Ludwig van Beethoven

Wellingtons Sieg, op. 91

1813–1814 · Hess 97 · Biamonti 584

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 16'

  • 1. Schlacht
  • 2. Sieges-Symphonie

This is a piano version of an orchestral work. Before the orchestral version, Beethoven wrote the Sieges-Symphonies for the mechanical Panharmonicon (Hess 108).

Recommended editions

  • Neue Gesamtausgabe (Henle) · VII/8 [in preparation]
  • Breitkopf & Härtel · Supplemente zur Gesamtausgabe VIII / Original-Klavierauszüge eigener Werke · ed. Willy Hess

1. Schlacht

Duration: 8' 30"

Difficulty: 3

2. Sieges-Symphonie

Duration: 7' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
